alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 12:16PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact areas near Shonto in Navajo County through 200 PM MDT... At 114 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Tsegi, or 48 miles northeast of Tuba City, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Localized flooding can occur. Locations impacted include... Shonto. This includes the following highways... State Route 564 between mile markers 375 and 382. Highway 160 between mile markers 361 and 378. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward
